isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000, 9100, 9200, 9400, AND 9900 MODELS - SLEEPER LIGHTING AND ACCESSORIES - OPERATION - Power Salem Vent With PRO SLEEPER

svcproc.title: Power Salem Vent With PRO SLEEPER
svcproc.para: With the vent switch in the low or high position, power flows from battery stud (B2) through circuits 14AK, 14AV, fuse F10-B, circuit 14AX, fuse 582 - B, circuits 76K and 76M to the Power Salem Vent. The ground path is circuits 76-GM, 11-GAF, 11-GBC, 11-GBD, and 11-GBE to ground adapter (454).
